constantValues: 'Limit' entity represents corporate client’s limits set up in the limit management system or the bank’s backend systems such as core banking, treasury, or trade finance systems. This data is imported

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: availableLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Available Limit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Available Limit in base currency.

value.name: companyId

constantValues: Reference to the corporate client for which the limit is implemented.

value.description: Reference to the corporate client for which the limit is implemented.

members.name: implementedLimit

constantValues: Total amount implemented in the limit management/core banking/treasury/ trade finance system.

members.description: Total amount implemented in the limit management/core banking/treasury/ trade finance system.

members.name: implementedLimitBase

constantValues: Value of the Implemented Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Implemented Amount in base currency.

members.name: limitExpiry

constantValues: The date on which the limit will expiry and will require review/renewal by the bank.

members.description: The date on which the limit will expiry and will require review/renewal by the bank.

members.name: limitName

constantValues: Name of the limit implemented for the client.

members.description: Name of the limit implemented for the client.

members.name: limitType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The type of limit implemented for the client.

members.description: The type of limit implemented for the client.

members.name: utilizedLimit

constantValues: Total amount utilized by the client so far through different products of the bank such as loans and guarantees.

members.description: Total amount utilized by the client so far through different products of the bank such as loans and guarantees.

members.name: utilizedAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Utilized Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Utilized Amount in base currency.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Limit

members.description: Reason for the status of the Limit

value.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

value.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

definitions.description: 'Limit' entity represents corporate client’s limits set up in the limit management system or the bank’s backend systems such as core banking, treasury, or trade finance systems. This data is imported
